author: costin
msg: Remove the experimental file, all relevant logic has been merged.
Use 'ant build' to do a quick(er) build ( that uses the original
ant files ! ). The 'run' target is merged into catalina.xml next
to launcher.
PR:

author: remm
msg: - Cleanup installoptions support.
- Update to NSIS nightly.

author: remm
msg: - Update building to use the new autoconfiguration (less configurable, but
far easier).
- Of course, developers may choose to do everything manually ;-)

author: remm
msg: - Add a "main"build" script to allow newbies to build Tomcat very easily
once Ant is correctly setup (at least with JDK 1.3+).
- The small build.xml will be made available online as a separate (and small)
download, as it's the only thing required.
- New building documentation coming soon.

author: remm
msg: - Remove taglibs and commons checkouts. (Ideally), we should have only binary
dependencies on these, right ?
